name: Our Legacy
description:
Follow the adventure of Jake as he learns about the importance of what was entrusted to us from generations past exploring different cultures, and the metaphor that links his situation and where humanity is today.

Game made for cultural heritage game jam.

A 17 days project.

Game Made By : - Souhaib Benchaker

Voice Actor : - Chekikene Mohamed Aniss

2D Artists : - Dyane Donatus Justin

                           - Mohammed Essaddiq Benterraz

How to install : Download Our Legacy.rar and extract it, then run Our Legacy.exe

Update : Added Chapter Select to the Title Screen.

Not : Expect some bugs in Egypt if you're running under 30FPS, adjust the settings according to your system.

Not 2 : if you're having the Fatal Error when entering the first portal (starting Egypt Level) lower the graphics settings, if it persists your GPU isn't strong enough to load it and you can skip it from Chapter Select in The Title Screen.
